title: Querying the GoG / inertia matrix / mass of an entire model

content.raw: I would like to write a model plugin that broadcasts the CoG / inertia matrix / mass of an entire model, and not just its links, at a given instant in time. Looking through the physics::Model class I don't see any obvious hooks to do this. Presumably, the physics engine calculates these values when simulating the dynamics.  If I had the correct equations I guess I could iterate over Links in the model, manually calculating this value. I'm hoping however, that Gazebo calculates this internally and caches it for me.
